languages.text: {n}Инфернус-мастер указывает на татуировку на правом предплечье.{/n} "Это — при утечке плазмы из внешнего кормового контура. Представьте: вы снаружи, на обшивке, в одной руке терморезак, второй вцепились в магнитный ухват. Из пробоин хлещут лазурные всполохи, способные испепелить за секунду. Все что вас отделяет от гибели — хлипкий трос и скаф древнее {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Святой Терры{/g}. Я тогда заплатил малую цену в сравнении с моими товарищами". {n}Энрих шевелит {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}пальцами-аугментами{/g} правой руки.{/n}

{n}He points to a tattoo on his right forearm:{/n} "This one is from the time plasma leaked from the outer aft circuit. Imagine yourself clinging to the hull outside, thermal cutter in one hand and a magnetic clamp in other. Azure flames burst from the breach, the kind that can incinerate you in a second. All that separates you from death is a flimsy rope and a void suit more ancient than {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}. And yet the price I paid was nothing compared to my comrades..." {n}He slowly moves the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} of his right hand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Инфернус-мастер указывает на татуировку на правом предплечье.{/n} "Это — при утечке плазмы из внешнего кормового контура. Все что вас отделяет от гибели — хлипкий трос и скаф древнее {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Святой Терры{/g}. Я тогда заплатил малую цену в сравнении с моими товарищами". {n}Энрих шевелит {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}пальцами-аугментами{/g} правой руки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Infernus Master points to a tattoo on his right forearm..{/n} "This one is from when plasma leaked from the outer aft circuit. Imagine yourself clinging to the hull outside, thermo-cutter in one hand and a magnetic clamp in other. Azure flames burst from the breach, the kind that can incinerate you in a second. All that separates you from death is a flimsy rope and a void suit more ancient than Holy Terra. I paid a small price compared to my comrades." {n}Einrich moves the augmented fingers of his right hand.{/n}

I paid a small price compared to my comrades." {n}Einrich moves the augmented fingers of his right hand.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Er deutet auf eine Tätowierung auf seinem rechten Unterarm:{/n} "Die stammt aus der Zeit, als Plasma aus dem äußeren Hecksystem austrat. Stellt Euch vor, Ihr hängt an der Außenhülle des Schiffs, einen Thermalschneider in der einen und eine Magnetklammer in der anderen Hand. Aus dem Leck lodern blaue Flammen, die so heiß sind, dass sie Euch in einer Sekunde verbrennen können. Alles, was Euch vom Tod trennt, ist ein dünnes Seil und ein Raumanzug, der älter ist, als das {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Heilige Terra{/g}. Und doch habe ich gemessen an meinen Kameraden nur einen geringen Preis bezahlt ..." {n}Er bewegt langsam die {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmentierten Finger{/g} seiner rechten Hand.{/n}

And yet the price I paid was nothing compared to my comrades..." {n}He slowly moves the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} of his right hand.{/n}

Und doch habe ich gemessen an meinen Kameraden nur einen geringen Preis bezahlt ..." {n}Er bewegt langsam die augmentierten Finger seiner rechten Hand.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il désigne un tatouage, sur son bras :{/n} « Celle-ci remonte au jour où on a dû colmater une fuite de plasma, dans le circuit extérieur de la poupe. Imaginez-vous {mf|accroché|accrochée} à la paroi externe de la coque, une découpeuse thermique dans une main et une pince magnétique dans l'autre, alors que des flammes bleues s'échappent de la brèche, si dévorantes qu'elles peuvent vous réduire en cendres en une fraction de seconde. Tout ce qui vous sépare de la mort, c'est une corde élimée et un scaphandre encore plus vieux que la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Sainte Terra{/g}. Et pourtant, le prix que j'ai payé ce jour-là n'est rien, par rapport à mes camarades... » {n}Il déplace lentement les {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}doigts augmentés{/g} de sa main droite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points to a tattoo on his right forearm:{/n} "This one is from the time plasma leaked from the outer aft circuit. Imagine yourself clinging to the hull outside, thermal cutter in one hand and a magnetic clamp in other. Azure flames burst from the breach, the kind that can incinerate you in a second. All that separates you from death is a flimsy rope and a void suit more ancient than {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}. And yet the price I paid was nothing compared to my comrades..." {n}He slowly moves the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} of his right hand.{/n}

Et pourtant, le prix que j'ai payé ce jour-là n'est rien, par rapport à mes camarades... » {n}Il déplace lentement les doigts augmentés de sa main droite.{/n}

Et pourtant, le prix que j'ai payé ce jour-là n'est rien, par rapport à mes camarades... » {n}Il déplace lentement les doigts augmentés de sa main droite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Señala un tatuaje que tiene en el antebrazo derecho.{/n} «Este es de cuando se produjo la fuga de plasma en el cableado externo de popa. Imagínese {mf|aferrado|aferrada} al casco, con un soplete en una mano y una abrazadera magnética en la otra. De la brecha brotan unas llamas azules que podrían {mf|incinerarlo|incinerarla} en un santiamén. Lo único que le separa de una muerte segura es un cabo muy fino y un traje del vacío más viejo que la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Sagrada Terra{/g}. Y pese a ello, el precio que pagué no fue nada comparado con el de mis camaradas...». {n}Mientras habla, mueve lentamente los {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}dedos aumentados{/g} de su mano derecha.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points to a tattoo on his right forearm:{/n} "This one is from the time plasma leaked from the outer aft circuit. Imagine yourself clinging to the hull outside, thermal cutter in one hand and a magnetic clamp in other. Azure flames burst from the breach, the kind that can incinerate you in a second. All that separates you from death is a flimsy rope and a void suit more ancient than {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}. And yet the price I paid was nothing compared to my comrades..." {n}He slowly moves the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} of his right hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Señala un tatuaje que tiene en el antebrazo derecho.{/n} «Este es de cuando se produjo la fuga de plasma en el cableado externo de popa. Imagínese {mf|aferrado|aferrada} al casco, con un soplete en una mano y una abrazadera magnética en la otra. De la brecha brotan unas llamas azules que podrían {mf|incinerarlo|incinerarla} en un santiamén. Lo único que le separa de una muerte segura es un cabo muy fino y un traje de vacío más viejo que la Sagrada Terra. Y pese a ello, el precio que pagué no fue nada comparado con el de mis camaradas...». {n}Mientras habla, mueve lentamente los dedos cibernéticos de su mano derecha.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼は右腕のタトゥーを指差す。{/n}「これは船尾外側のカイロからプラズマが漏れた時のものです。片手にサーマルカッター、もう片方にマグネットクランプを持って、船体の外側にしがみついている自分を想像してみてください。自分を一瞬で焼死させるであろう紺碧の炎が裂け目から噴出する。自分と死を隔てているのは脆弱なロープと{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}聖なる地球{/g}よりも古いヴォイドスーツのみ。その上で私が払った代償は、仲間たちに比べれば大した事のないものでした…」{n}彼は右手の{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}補強された指{/g}をゆっくりと動かす。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points to a tattoo on his right forearm:{/n} "This one is from the time plasma leaked from the outer aft circuit. Imagine yourself clinging to the hull outside, thermal cutter in one hand and a magnetic clamp in other. Azure flames burst from the breach, the kind that can incinerate you in a second. All that separates you from death is a flimsy rope and a void suit more ancient than {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}. And yet the price I paid was nothing compared to my comrades..." {n}He slowly moves the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} of his right hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は右腕のタトゥーを指差す。{/n}「これは船尾外側のカイロからプラズマが漏れた時のものです。片手にサーマルカッター、もう片方にマグネットクランプを持って、船体の外側にしがみついている自分を想像してみてください。自分を一瞬で焼死させるであろう紺碧の炎が裂け目から噴出する。自分と死を隔てているのは脆弱なロープと聖なる地球よりも古いヴォイドスーツのみ。その上で私が払った代償は、仲間たちに比べれば大した事のないものでした…」{n}彼は右手の補強された指をゆっくりと動かす。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他指着右前臂上的纹身。{/n}“这个是等离子体在外部电路泄漏的时候留下来的。想象一下，你紧紧抓着船板，一只手拿着热切割机，另一只手拿着磁力钳。缺口喷出了亮蓝色的火焰，只消一秒钟就能把你烧成灰烬。而你与死亡之间相隔的，仅仅是一条脆弱的绳子，以及一套比{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}神圣泰拉{/g}还要来古老的虚空制服。不过，和我的同伴们相比，我付出的代价简直是微不足道……”{n}他慢慢动着右手手指的{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}植入物{/g}。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He points to a tattoo on his right forearm:{/n} "This one is from the time plasma leaked from the outer aft circuit. Imagine yourself clinging to the hull outside, thermal cutter in one hand and a magnetic clamp in other. Azure flames burst from the breach, the kind that can incinerate you in a second. All that separates you from death is a flimsy rope and a void suit more ancient than {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}. And yet the price I paid was nothing compared to my comrades..." {n}He slowly moves the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} of his right hand.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sağ kolundaki bir dövmeyi gösteriyor.{/n} "Bu, kıç tarafının dışındaki devrelerdeki plazma sızıntısından kalma. Dışarıda olduğunuzu ve bir elinizde termal kesici, diğerinde de manyetik kelepçe varken geminin gövdesine tutunmaya çalıştığınızı hayal edin. Yarıktan sizi bir saniye içinde kül edebilecek mavi alevler fışkırıyor. Sizi ölümden koruyan tek şey, zayıf bir halat ve {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Kutsal Terra'dan{/g} daha eski bir uçsuz giysisi. Her şeye rağmen benim ödediğim bedel, yoldaşlarıma kıyasla hiçbir şey." {n}Sağ elindeki {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}ogment parmakları{/g} yavaşça oynatıyor.{/n}

Imagine yourself clinging to the hull outside, thermal cutter in one hand and a magnetic clamp in other. Azure flames burst from the breach, the kind that can incinerate you in a second. All that separates you from death is a flimsy rope and a void suit more ancient than {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Holy Terra{/g}. And yet the price I paid was nothing compared to my comrades..." {n}He slowly moves the {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented fingers{/g} of his right hand.{/n}
